mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT qi.QI_PRO_LOT_ID FROM QUALITY_INSPECTION qi WHERE qi.QI_PRO_LOT_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY qi.QI_PRO_LOT_ID
SELECT DISTINCT qi.QI_PI_ID FROM QUALITY_INSPECTION qi WHERE qi.QI_PI_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY qi.QI_PI_ID
SELECT DISTINCT pi2.PI_NAME FROM PROCESS_INFO pi2 JOIN QUALITY_INSPECTION qi ON pi2.PI_ID = qi.QI_PI_ID
SELECT DISTINCT qs.QS_DF_DIV1 FROM QUALITY_STANDARD qs JOIN QUALITY_INSPECTION qi ON qi.QI_QS_ID = qs.QS_ID WHERE qi.QI_PI_ID IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT qs.QS_DF_DIV2 AS qsDiv2 FROM QUALITY_STANDARD qs WHERE QS_DF_DIV1 = #{qsDiv1}
SELECT DISTINCT qi.QI_WORK_ID FROM QUALITY_INSPECTION qi WHERE qi.QI_WORK_ID IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT mi.MI_ID FROM MACHINE_INFO mi JOIN PROCESS_INFO pi ON mi.MI_ID = pi.PI_MACHINE_ID JOIN QUALITY_INSPECTION qi ON qi.QI_PI_ID = pi.PI_ID WHERE mi.MI_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY mi.MI_ID
